alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 10:46PM EDT until April 03 at 11:25PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Indiana...Illinois... Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Missouri...Illinois... Ohio River at Cairo. .Minor flooding is either occurring or forecast at several points along the lower Ohio River. The river is forecast to crest in minor flood at all forecast points later this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 38.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 44.5 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage next Monday. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
